languages.text: {n}Кассия любуется великолепием витражей, освещенных неярким сиянием люменов. Лицо ее задумчиво и спокойно — словно все переживания разом оставили попытки истерзать ее душу.{/n} "{name}? Не ожидала встретить вас здесь в этот час..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия любуется великолепием витражей, освещенных неярким сиянием люменов. Лицо ее задумчиво и спокойно — словно все переживания разом оставили попытки истерзать ее душу{/n}. "{name}? Не ожидала встретить вас здесь в этот час..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia is admiring the magnificence of the stained glass images lit by the dim glow of lumens. Her face is pensive and calm, as if all her concerns have suddenly abandoned their attempts to torture her soul.{/n} "{name}? I did not expect to meet you here at this hour..."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия любуется великолепием витражей, освещенных неярким сиянием люменов. Лицо ее задумчиво и спокойно — словно все переживания разом оставили попытки истерзать ее душу.{/n} "{name}? Не ожидала встретить вас здесь в этот час..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia is admiring the magnificence of the stained glass images lit by the dim glow of lumens. Her face is pensive and calm, as if all her concerns have suddenly abandoned their attempts to torture her soul.{/n} "{name}? I did not expect to meet you here at this hour..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅正就着流明灯昏暗的光线细细欣赏彩绘玻璃的美妙图案。她面色沉静，在这一刻，仿佛所有的忧愁都离她而去，不再折磨她悲伤的灵魂。{/n}“{name}？我真没想到会在这时遇见你……”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia is admiring the magnificence of the stained glass images lit by the dim glow of lumens. Her face is pensive and calm, as if all her concerns have suddenly abandoned their attempts to torture her soul.{/n} "{name}? I did not expect to meet you here at this hour..."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅正就着流明灯昏暗的光线细细欣赏彩绘玻璃的图案。她面色沉静，在这一刻，仿佛所有的忧愁都离她而去，不再折磨她悲伤的灵魂。{/n}“{name}？我真没想到会在这时遇见你……”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia bewundert die Schönheit des Buntglasbildes, das vom schwachen Leuchten der Lumens erhellt wird. Ihre Miene ist nachdenklich und ruhig, als hätten all ihre Sorgen plötzlich ihre Bemühungen aufgegeben, ihre Seele zu quälen.{/n} "{name}? Ich hätte nicht erwartet, Euch zu dieser Uhrzeit hier zu treffen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia is admiring the magnificence of the stained glass images lit by the dim glow of lumens. Her face is pensive and calm, as if all her concerns have suddenly abandoned their attempts to torture her soul.{/n} "{name}? I did not expect to meet you here at this hour..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia bewundert die Schönheit des Buntglasbilds, das vom schwachen Leuchten der Lumens erhellt wird. Ihre Miene ist nachdenklich und ruhig, als hätten all ihre Sorgen plötzlich ihre Bemühungen aufgegeben, ihre Seele zu quälen.{/n} "{name}? Ich hätte nicht erwartet, Euch zu dieser Uhrzeit hier zu treffen ..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia admire les magnifiques images du vitrail éclairé par la faible lueur des lumens. Elle a le visage calme et pensif, comme si toutes ses inquiétudes avaient soudain cessé de tenter de torturer son âme.{/n} « {name} ? Je ne m'attendais pas à vous voir ici, à cette heure... »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia is admiring the magnificence of the stained glass images lit by the dim glow of lumens. Her face is pensive and calm, as if all her concerns have suddenly abandoned their attempts to torture her soul.{/n} "{name}? I did not expect to meet you here at this hour..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia admire la beauté des images du vitrail éclairé par la faible lueur des lumens. Elle a le visage calme et pensif, comme si toutes ses inquiétudes avaient soudain cessé de tenter de torturer son âme.{/n} « {name} ? Je ne m'attendais pas à vous voir ici, à cette heure... »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia admira la magnificencia de las vidrieras iluminadas por el tenue resplandor de las luces. Su rostro está pensativo y tranquilo, como si todas sus preocupaciones hubieran abandonado de repente sus intentos de torturar su alma.{/n} «¿{name}? No esperaba encontrármelo aquí a estas horas...».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia is admiring the magnificence of the stained glass images lit by the dim glow of lumens. Her face is pensive and calm, as if all her concerns have suddenly abandoned their attempts to torture her soul.{/n} "{name}? I did not expect to meet you here at this hour..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia admira la magnificencia de las vidrieras iluminadas por el tenue resplandor de las luces. Su rostro está pensativo y tranquilo, como si todas sus preocupaciones hubieran abandonado de repente sus intentos de torturar su alma.{/n} «¿{name}? No esperaba encontrármelo aquí a estas horas...».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアはルーメンのぼんやりした光に照らされるステンドグラスの像を、感心して眺めている。彼女の表情は物思いに沈んでいるが落ち着いており、彼女の心配が突然、その魂を苦しめようという企てを放棄したかのようだった。{/n}「{name}様？あたくしはこの時間にこの場所で、あなたにお会いするとは思っていませんでした…」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia is admiring the magnificence of the stained glass images lit by the dim glow of lumens. Her face is pensive and calm, as if all her concerns have suddenly abandoned their attempts to torture her soul.{/n} "{name}? I did not expect to meet you here at this hour..."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアはルーメンのぼんやりした光に照らされるステンドグラスの像を、感心して眺めている。彼女の表情は物思いに沈んでいるが落ち着いており、彼女の心配が突然、その魂を苦しめようという企てを放棄したかのようだった。{/n}「{name}様？あたくしはこの時間にこの場所で、あなたにお会いするとは思っていませんでした…」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Cassia is admiring the magnificence of the stained glass images lit by the dim glow of lumens. Her face is pensive and calm, as if all her concerns have suddenly abandoned their attempts to torture her soul.{/n} "? I did not expect to meet you here at this hour..."

languages.text: {n}Cassia, lümenlerin loş ışığıyla aydınlanan vitrayların güzelliğini seyreyliyor. Bakışları durgun, yüz ifadesi sakin. Tüm dertlerinden kurtulmuş, ruhuna azap çektiren endişelerini tamamen unutmuş gibi bir hâli var.{/n} "{name}? Seni bu saatte burada görmeyi beklemiyordum..."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia is admiring the magnificence of the stained glass images lit by the dim glow of lumens. Her face is pensive and calm, as if all her concerns have suddenly abandoned their attempts to torture her soul.{/n} "{name}? I did not expect to meet you here at this hour..."
